header.gameNote: DRAKE REGENCY CHALLENGE AT DES MOINES IA

article.headline: Montana 81, Miss. Valley St. 57
article.story: DES MOINES, Iowa (AP) -- Senior Kevin Criswell scored 18 points and junior Andrew Strait added 17 to lead Montana over Mississippi Valley State 81-57 on Friday at the Drake Regency Classic. The Grizzlies (6-1) maintained a 20-point lead until the 12:49 mark in the second half. The Delta Devils (0-4) cut the lead to 13 points with 3:49 remaining, but Montana closed on a 12-1 run to finish the game. The Grizzlies lead 44-25 at the half. The team continued its hot shooting, hitting 51.9 percent from the field and 76.9 percent from the free-throw line. MVSU was limited to 36.5 percent shooting. Criswell made 3-of-5 three-pointers en route to his team-high 18 points. Strait added seven rebounds while sophomore Mike Chavez tallied 12 points and six rebounds off the bench. Sophomore Matt Martin added nine points on 3-of-5 shooting from the three-point arc. Tyschicus Snow had a game-high 22 points on 8-of-11 shooting to lead the Delta Devils. He was the only player to reach double figures. The win was Montana's sixth straight. The Griz play Drake (5-2) for the championship Saturday night.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
